creator: ggregory@seagullsw.com
text:
The LogManager in CVS (v 1.22) class prints out on System.out! This is quite bad
for us as it will cerainly confuse our customers. Please remove or make this
conditional. Thanks.

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text:
Fixed by making System.out printouts conditional on the system property
log4j.debug being true (and setting it to false by default).
